0000	0011000000000111	addi	r00<-7
0001	0011010100000010	addi	r01<-2
0010	0000000110000000	or	r10<-r00 or r01
0011	0000000110000001	and	r10<-r00 and r01
0100	0000000110000010	add	r10<-r00 + r01
0101	0000000110000011	sub	r10<-r00 -r01
0110	1001000110000000	slly	r10<-r00<<r01
0111	1010000110000000	srly	r10<-r00>>r01
1000	1011000111000000	sray	r11<-r00>>r01(a)
1001	1100000110000000	slt	r10<-(r00 < r01) ? 1 : 0
1010	1101000100000001	lui	r01<-imm<<8
1011	0001000100001000	ori	r01<-r00 or imm
1100	0010000100000001	andi	r01<-r00 and imm
1101	0100000100000111	lw	r01<-mem[r00+imm]
1110	0101001000000011	sw	mem[r00+imm]<-r10
1111	0110000100000001	bne	pc<-pc + 1 + "00000001"
10000	0000000110000000	or	r10<-r00 or r01
10001	0111000000010010	jump	pc<-(1111)&“000000010010”(该指令低12位)
10010	1000000000000000	halt
